name: famous

scripts.test-components: browserify components/test/*.js | tap-closer | smokestack -b firefox | tap-spec
scripts.test-core: browserify core/test/*.js | tap-closer | smokestack -b firefox | tap-spec
scripts.test-dom-renderables: browserify dom-renderables/test/*.js | tap-closer | smokestack -b firefox | tap-spec
scripts.test-dom-renderers: browserify dom-renderers/test/*.js | tap-closer | smokestack -b firefox | tap-spec
scripts.test-engine: browserify engine/test/*.js | tap-closer | smokestack -b firefox | tap-spec
scripts.test-math: browserify math/test/*.js | tap-closer | smokestack -b firefox | tap-spec
scripts.test-physics: browserify physics/test/*.js physics/test/*/*.js | tap-closer | smokestack -b firefox | tap-spec
scripts.test-polyfills: browserify polyfills/test/*.js | tap-closer | smokestack -b firefox | tap-spec
scripts.test-utilities: browserify utilities/test/*.js | tap-closer | smokestack -b firefox | tap-spec
scripts.test-webgl-geometries: browserify webgl-geometries/test/*.js | tap-closer | smokestack -b firefox | tap-spec
scripts.test-webgl-materials: browserify webgl-materials/test/*.js | tap-closer | smokestack -b firefox | tap-spec
scripts.test-webgl-renderables: browserify webgl-renderables/test/*.js | tap-closer | smokestack -b firefox | tap-spec
scripts.test-webgl-renderers: browserify webgl-renderers/test/*.js | tap-closer | smokestack -b firefox | tap-spec
scripts.test: npm run test-components && npm run test-core && npm run test-dom-renderables && npm run test-dom-renderers && npm run test-engine && npm run test-math && npm run test-physics && npm run test-polyfills && npm run test-utilities && npm run test-webgl-geometries && npm run test-webgl-materials && npm run test-webgl-renderables && npm run test-webgl-renderers
scripts.check: jscs core dom-renderers physics renderers stylesheets utilities webgl-materials webgl-renderers components dom-renderables engine math polyfills router transitions webgl-geometries webgl-renderables webgl-shaders
scripts.build: mkdir dist; browserify index.js --standalone famous | uglifyjs --screw-ie8 -m -c dead_code,sequences,conditionals,booleans,unused,if_return,join_vars,drop_debugger > dist/famous.min.js

readme:
Famous
=================

Please join us on the "famous-community" slack.

Sign up --> http://slack.famous.org/
Join the discussion --> https://famous-community.slack.com

Get started with the seed --> https://github.com/Famous/mixed-mode-seed

There is a bunch of learning material at --> http://learn-staging.famo.us/start.html

Some things might be out of date. 

We are hoping to have a new site ready soon with up to date materials!

All rights reserved. Famous Industries 2015
